text: (nabiyē!) ovungē at soyā gat (napuru) kriyāvan hētuven ovunṭa ek amārukamak æti vū avasthāvēdī (eyaṭa pratikārayak soyā gata nohæki vū ovungē pahat tatvaya) kesē tibunēdæyi (yanna oba avadhānaya kara balanu). pasuva ovun oba vetama pæmiṇa “(api ovun veta giyē) hon̆dak hā ekamutukamak balāporottuven misa, vena kisivak api adahas karamin nova” yayi allāhgē nāmayen divrannāha
